description: This application was develop to make sure that there is no Lost fan using a Palm who’s going to miss the Lost Season six premiere on Thursday 2nd of February.  This application is a countdown to the great moment of Lost’s sixth season premiere. When the day arrives and alarm will ring and warn you about this epic moment in TV. Also the look and feel of this application was inspired by one of the best scenarios of Lost, the hatch, where Desmond spend 3 years of his life pushing the button to save the world.
